changeSet.author: Ahmed.Baz
changeSet.sql: create table course_images ( id int8 primary key, name varchar(255) not null, code varchar(255) not null, path varchar(255), type varchar(255) not null, data oid, created_at timestamp, created_by int8, last_modified_at timestamp, last_modified_by int8 );
create sequence course_images_seq minvalue 1 maxvalue 9999999999 start with 1 increment by 1 cache 20;
